preface.title: Preface
preface.para: The MATE &manrevision; Desktop Accessibility Guide describes how to configure, customize and use the accessibility features of the MATE &manrevision; Desktop.

sect1.title: Who Should Read This Guide
sect1.para: This guide is for users, system administrators, and anyone else who is interested in how the MATE &mateversion; Desktop supports people with disabilities. This guide also addresses the requirements of Section 508 of the U.S. Rehabilitation Act.

sect1.title: How This Guide Is Organized
sect1.para: This guide is structured in the following manner:

listitem.para: introduces you to accessibility in the MATE Desktop.
describes how to configure the mouse and keyboard to make these devices accessible to more users.
describes how to navigate the MATE Desktop from the keyboard.
describes the features and methods you can use to change the appearance of the MATE Desktop. These features can enhance the accessibility of the desktop for users with visual impairments.
introduces you to the assistive technologies that are available from the MATE Desktop.
describes the system administrator tasks that you need to perform before you can use the assistive technologies for the MATE Desktop.
